description.des: Build a web app where users can find top-rated tech videos and tutorials in the form of a course in a structured way that are availble on Youtube.
Enabling users to share projects, receive real-time feedback, and discuss doubts, creating a supportive learning community.
Blog Interface useful for creations of Blogs, edit their Blogs as well as delete it.
Any user can read and share the blogs of other on social media.
A frontend based website where user can save tasks in their local storage of the browser.
TextUtils is a simple web application built with React that allows users to manipulate and analyze text.
Convert text to uppercase and lowercase, clear text, copy text, text summary, text preview, reading time estimation.
A web application showcasing the inner workings of sorting algorithms.
Bubble sort, Selection sort, Insertion sort, Merge sort, Quick sort, Heap sort
An online educational platform to help students with study materials for the preparation of placements.
It helps young students to get answers for reference, especially in the engineering stream.
Real-time chat functionality powered by Firebase enables instant messaging.
Secure authentication system ensures privacy and data protection.
User-friendly interface built with ReactJS enhances seamless interaction.
